review:
I wanted to express my deepest gratitude and appreciation for his exceptional care and expertise during my dad’s recent surgery. His skill and dedication truly made a difference in our lives.

My father had been suffering from osteoarthritis for quite a long time and we had almost given up after getting multiple temporary treatments. I met Dr. Debashish last year for the first time and he made us so comfortable in explaining the entire thing. He takes time with the patient explaining him intricate details and suggests surgeries only when it is required.

From the moment we met, his professionalism and compassion put us at ease. He patiently explained the procedure and answered all our questions, alleviating any concerns we had. During the surgery, we felt complete trust knowing we were in the hands of such a capable and experienced surgeon.

His post-operative care was equally impressive. His attention to detail and willingness to listen to our concerns made my dad’s recovery smoother than we could have imagined.

It has been over 10 days now and my dad has started walking and doing his own chores without any assistance. Though his legs pain but it will overcome in the coming days.

The only thing is that we have to be patient with the process and trust the doctor with his experience, professionalism and belief.

I really want to thank him for going above and beyond to ensure the best possible outcome. His passion for his work and commitment to his patients are truly admirable. We are grateful to have been under your care and will always remember the positive impact you've had on my dad’s life.

Now if you don’t follow the instructions and want to jumble between opd and emergency to skip lines, thats not right. Patient word its self has come from patience, you should have patience.
I have explained about the need of plaster for which you have refused which i have explained is your wish. I have spent full required time with you to full fil your queries. Now treatment can’t be according to your choice.
My request is if your problem is so small then you should visit some clinic nearby, where you can save time.
